title: Unsupervised Segmentation of Rice Export Varieties Using Domestic Production and Export Performance Metrics
problem_statement: Identify latent clusters of rice export varieties based on their export quantity/value trajectories and corresponding domestic production metrics. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness

join_plan.notes: Join filtered export data (2020-25) with production data on Year and mapped 'Rice' crop, using Total season production metrics

transform_ideas: Normalize time-series values by domestic production
feature_plan.handling_missingness: Drop rows with missing values in core time-series columns (≤12.5% missing in 2018-19 data)

validation_plan: Evaluate clustering stability using silhouette scores and domain-validated cluster interpretations
quality_checks: Verify ≥65% completeness in all feature columns post-join
Check multicollinearity between production and export metrics

excluded_columns.reason: Categorical text not needed for clustering
Lower relevance to export value analysis

expected_outputs: Cluster assignments with rice variety groupings
Parallel coordinate plots showing cluster characteristics
